question: A school plans to increase its student intake by 15% next year. If the current enrollment is 1,200 students, how many students are expected next year? (Scenario 1)
A textbook originally priced at RM80 is being offered at 25% discount. What is the discounted price? (Scenario 2)

A school plans to increase its student intake by 15% next year. If the current enrollment is 1,200 students, how many students are expected next year? (Scenario 4)

A university library receives a government grant of RM120,000 to be spent equally over 8 departments. How much does each department get? (Scenario 6)
A university library receives a government grant of RM120,000 to be spent equally over 8 departments. How much does each department get? (Scenario 7)
A tuition centre earned RM9,600 in four months. If earnings increased by RM200 each month, how much did it earn in the fourth month? (Scenario 8)
explanation: Let first month = x, then next months: x+200, x+400, x+600. Sum = 4x + 1200 = 9600 => x = 2100, so 4th = 2100+600 = 2700.
